column3:
There was once a land named Catatonia where cats ran things. Cats walked and talked much
ewlineas you do except they walked on four legs. There were cat policemen, cat firemen, cat
ewlineteachers, and even a cat bus driver. Most of the cats were very busy.
ewline   
ewlineThe King of Catatonia was a small cat named Diggs. He had two brothers named Pouncer and
ewlineFlash who helped him rule in Catatonia. Pouncer was head of the Milk, Cheese and Cream
ewlinecenter and Flash's job was to blow things up. Together the three of them made sure all
ewlinethe cats were happy, had plenty to drink and got to enjoy bright fireworks shows in the
ewlinedistance.
ewline    
ewlineOne day Pouncer's wife brought the kittens to see Pouncer at his office. There were white
ewlinekittens and lots of black and white spotted kittens walking around in the Milk, Cheese and
ewlineCream center.
ewline   
ewlineWell that is all the time we have for now. I hope this short story of the Cats of
ewlineCatatonia made at least one person in the room smile.
column4: one: What type of job was NOT in the story?
column9: multiple: What did Flash do in Catatonia?
column10: Blew up things and put on bright fireworks shows in the distance
column14: multiple: What were the names of the ruling brothers?
column19: one: What type of kittens did NOT come to visit Pouncer?
